articles.title: Biden makes the case for wartime aid to Israel and Ukraine in primetime address - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden tied the wars in Ukraine and Israel together during a primetime Oval Office address Thursday, making an impassioned appeal to the American people to support two fellow democracies that he says are facing existential threats.
